short_summary: Rent an indoor firing range facility for firearms training
description: Rental services of a firearms range facility in Chilliwack British Columbia for Border Services Officers' firearms training.
full_summary:
**Rent an Indoor Firing Range Facility**
=====================================================

**Contract Status:**
-------------------

*    Tender Closing Date: February 15, 2023, 13:00:00 (Local Time)
*    Tender Status: Expired
*    Notice Type: Advance Contract Award Notice

**Contract Summary:**
---------------------

The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) is seeking rental services for an indoor firing range facility in Chilliwack, British Columbia, to provide armed Border Services Officers with firearms training, as per prescribed standard policies.

**Key Requirements:**

*    Provision of firearms range for approximately 100 days per year
*    Provision of safety procedures
*    Security requirements: None

**Contract Period:**
-------------------

The contract period is from contract award to February 28, 2025, with the option to extend the contract by four (4) additional one-year periods.

**Supplier Requirements:**
-------------------------

Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the services described in this tender notice may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the contact person identified in this notice on or before the closing date and time of this notice. This statement of capabilities must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the advertised requirements.

**Contact Information:**
-----------------------

Lynn Kalp
Email: lynn.kalp@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca

**Attachments:**
-----------------

*   [Full Tender Notice] (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/01/76436b03cdbc119196fc9d5aad0a6442/cbsa_standards_on_firing_ranges.pdf)
*   [Statement of Capabilities] (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/01/a7a3875413ee9335266065ad68a47890/1000405242_-_acan_en_1.pdf)

Note: Both attachments are available on the Canadabuy.ca website.
**************
